title: saraNam vijaya
sahitya:
sharaNam vijaya sarasvati mAyE sarva jIva dayApari brahmajAyE



anupallavi



 niravadhi sukha dAyaki nIrajAkSi sarasIruhAsini sarvasAkSi



caraNam



 kSarAkSaRAdi sarva bhUtavyApi sarva yantra mantra tantra

 svarUpi vara lakSmi shakti vAgIvari harikEshadAsa alankAri
